Sun, 04 Feb 2024 23:00:00 +0000 The patient says she was struggling with addiction and bipolar when the mental health worker from a secure unit she was admitted to for five weeks paid her for sex.

Sun, 04 Feb 2024 22:01:59 +0000 Kaysi Fredericks and her husband, Sam, have applied for more than100 rentals. They need a place that is wheelchair and pet friendly. Pictured top L-R: Kaysi, Codi (16). Bottom L-R: Renesmae (10), Arabella (12) and Aram (14). Absent: Sam Fredericks. 31 January 2024 Bay of Plenty Times Photo / Alex Cairns

Sun, 04 Feb 2024 19:44:56 +0000 Plug-in hybrids will have to pay both petrol tax and road user charges from April 1. Kevin Parker wants to remove the plug from his Outlander PHEV then get it re-certified as a petrol vehicle.
